name: Save Santa (itch) (HannaMouse1)
description:
Made in Scratch.

Move with WASD, click to swing sword.

Watch me make the game:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLuR1ya-n-UhyyN5HzhbLTdU844LqPWUIC
